cppcoreguidelines-explicit-virtual-funct.description:
Description

The
cppcoreguidelines-explicit-virtual-functions
check is an alias,
please see
modernize-use-override
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-explicit-virtual-funct.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
